name: 3rd International Conference of Multidisciplinary & Interdisciplinary Bioscience
content: 3rd International Conference of Multidisciplinary & Interdisciplinary Bioscience (MIBIO 2024) April 13-14, 2024, Virtual Conference https://mibio2024.org/index SCOPE 3rd International Conference of Multidisciplinary & Interdisciplinary Bioscience (MIBIO 2024) will provide Biological Sciences Research remains the ubiquitous realm in better human health and well being. Multidisciplinary and interdisciplinary Bioscience Research has been stressed for explicit scientific advancements. Impact publications for a wider outreach are ascertained. MIBIO 2023 represents the launch-pad forum for researchers, biologists, students, Scientists and Physicians in peer-reviewed podium encompassing Biological Sciences. The conference takes pleasure in inviting your peer Research for a fantabulous realm of rapport in the arena of multidisciplinary and interdisciplinary Life sciences. The area offers discussions with biomedical and environment impact assessors. This allows you to enlighten, enrich and rejuvenate the multitude of oneness in biological sciences. The wide realms of research addressing any of the significant developments in the above-mentioned broad areas are welcome. The conference invites researchers to submit in the pivotal areas of publication interests. TOPICS OF INTEREST Priority Research areas mentioned broadly, but not restricted to specific regimes • Algorithms and Bioinformatics • Microbiology • Biotechnology • Immunology • Biochemistry • Bioinformatics • Computational Biology • Environmental Sciences • Marine Biology • Molecular Biology • Genetics • Biomedical Sciences • Industrial Biotechnology • Biophysics • Population Biology • Neurobiology • Plant Sciences • Physiology • Cell Biology • Conservation Biology • Ecology • Evolution • Animal Sciences • Applied Biosciencesg Engineering and Data analytics with computational perspectives • Astrobiology • Biophysics • Pharmaceutical biology • Immunotechnology • Biogeochemical sciences • Climate Sciences • Biostatistics • Advanced scenario in Biosciences and its significance • CRISPR (Clustered Regularly Interspaced Short Palindromic Repeats) Technology and Industrialization prospects: Scenario in Agriculture and Biomedical applications • Global warming and mitigation through bioscience perspectives • Future of renewable resources and Bioenergy: Commercialization • GMO (Genetically Modified Organisms) • Genetically modified crops: Patents and commercialization issues • Farming Technology: Agrobiologic insights and Agricultural engineering: Perspectives for global welfare • Food production Vs Population explosion • Need for Plant Clinical Trial Database : Limitations • Nature and Bioscience • Emerging infectious diseases and abatement strategies • How to address global warming and natural calamities • Food as medicine: Alternative medicine and evidence based traditional medicine • Origin of life: Existence against Survival of the fittest? • Money Vs Man • World health organization and wellbeing of the cosmos • Plantibiotics and actinomycetes in health • In vitro, in vivo, and in silico methodologies for incorporation of Art of living, creativity and emotional intelligence up gradation. Nature and Bioscience • Emerging infectious diseases and abatement strategies • How to address global warming and natural calamities • Food as medicine: Alternative medicine and evidence based traditional medicine • Origin of life: Existence against Survival of the fittest? • Money Vs Man • World health organization and wellbeing of the cosmos • Plantibiotics and actinomycetes in health • In vitro, in vivo, and in silico methodologies for incorporation of Art of living, creativity and emotional intelligence up gradation. PAPER SUBMISSION Authors are invited to submit papers through the conference Submission System by February 03, 2024\. Submissions must be original and should not have been published previously or be under consideration for publication while being evaluated for this conference. The proceedings of the conference will be published by International Journal on Bioinformatics & Biosciences (IJBB)series (Confirmed). Selected papers from MIBIO 2024, after further revisions, will be published in the special issue of the following journals • Bioscience & Engineering: An International Journal (BIOEJ) • International Journal on Bioinformatics & Biosciences (IJBB) • International Journal of Biomedical Engineering and Science (IJBES) • Advanced Energy: An International Journal (AEIJ) • Health Informatics: An International Journal (HIIJ) • Advanced Medical Sciences: An International Journal (AMS) IMPORTANT DATES • Submission Deadline : February 03, 2024 • Authors Notification : February 29, 2024 • Registration & Camera-Ready Paper Due : March 07, 2024 CONTACT US Here's where you can reach us: mibio@mibio2024.org or mibioconfe@yahoo.com Submission link https://mibio2024.org/submission/index.php
